Package com.nimsoft.nimbus

Interface Summary
NimLog.INimLogFactory  
 

Class Summary
NimAddress Container class to hold information about a Nimsoft bus address.
NimAlarm An alarm object with content.
NimBase64 This class provides static methods to encode and decode bytes using the Base64 encoding scheme.
NimCallback This class is used as a container for all callback methods in a NimSessionListener.
NimClientSession This class is used for sending requests / receiving responses from some other party.
NimConfig Configuration class used by the probe.
NimEnv Static container for environment variables.
NimHeartbeat This class ensures that only one instance of a probe is running at the same time.
The usage is simple:
Construct the class with the probe and the heart beat interval, and that's it.
NimInfo Singleton information class used for "global" information for a probe.
NimInfo.Builder Internal class used to build a NimInfo object.
NimLocalAddress  
NimLog The log class emulates the 'C' version in layout.
NimLog.DefaultNimLogFactory  
NimLog4jHelper Only for internal purposes used to log as log4j Had to use a separate class to avoid missing log4j classes when log4j was not used (i.e.
NimLogPrintStream A PrintStream that logs all output to a contained NimLog.
NimNamedClientSession This class is used for sending requests / receiving responses from some other party using tunneling by proxy if necessary.
NimNative All JNI calls goes through this class.
NimObjectSender  
NimPermission  
NimPost A Post object with PDS content
NimProbe The probe class
NimProbeBase The base class for the probe, containing parts of the probe that does not have to be seen in the probe.
NimQoS Snippet
NimRequest A Request object with PDS content.
NimSecurity Security class used for secure Nimbus transport.
NimSecurityBase Security class used for secure Nimbus transport.
NimServerSession This class is used for receiving requests / sending responses from / to some other party.
NimSession This class is only used as a common class for NimXxxxSession classes It does not contain anything.
NimSessionBase The base class for all NimxxxSession classes.
NimSessionListener The session listener handling callbacks and the accept socket.
NimSessionListenerList This class is used as the container for all sessions.
NimSSLSocket  
NimSubscribe A class used to subscribe to like queue messages from the hub.
NimUserLogin A user login object.
NimUtility Utility methods to display PDS objects, interpret time formats strings as set in configuration files, etc.
NimVar Handling of "variables" (get).
NimVersion The version class.
PDS Portable data format for Nimsoft Monitoring Solution.
PDS.Element One for each element in the PDS (stored in the Hashtable ht).
 

Exception Summary
InvalidMessageException A type of NimException that indicates that an invalid message was encountered.
NimException Nimsoft Exception class.
NimStatusCodeException Exception that indicates that a non-zero status code was received in the response from the peer (in the received header PDS).
